name: WARP-TEK
description: WARP-TEK is a horizontal space shooter wherein you have to rescue your pet after it got abducted by aliens and consequently imprisoned on a distant planet!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1.6GHz dual core Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Pretty much anything that can deal with OpenGL 3 and above Storage: 100 MB available space
